stochastic_function: lambda usage_decision: {-1: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else {5.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' else {20.0: 1.0}

lambda usage_decision, carcinogenic_activity, human_exposure: {0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else {0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' else {-0.05: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-0.5: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-5.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'high' else {-1.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-10.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-100.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'high' else {0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' else {-0.5: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-5.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-50.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'high' else {-10.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-100.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-1000.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'high' else {}
